mapper.select: select slideshow_path slideshowPath, goods_id goodsId from t_info_slideshow_home where is_deleted = 0 and slideshow_state_id = 1 and start_time <= now() and end_time >= now() order by slideshow_num asc
select count(invite_code) from t_info_store where is_deleted = 0 and invite_code = #{inviteCode}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (user_code, user_name, user_acct, user_pwd, id_card, sex, role, phone, email, invite_num, user_image, is_deleted, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userAcct}, #{userPassword}, #{idCard}, #{sex}, 4, #{phone}, #{mail}, #{inviteCode}, #{imagePath}, 0, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)
